import { useState } from 'react'; import { Events, Connections } from './data'; import SettingsIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Settings'; export default function Main() { const [showManageTimeLine, setShowManageTimeline] = useState(false); const [selectedStep, setSelectedStep] = useState(null); const maxStepId = Events.length > 0 ? Math.max(...Events.map(event => event.stepId)) : 0; return ( <>
{showManageTimeLine && (
Manage your timeline
{/* */}
)} ) }
